mainText.attr1: Welcome to the in game guide for Void Destroyer 2.
This guide is a copy of Void Destroyer's guide - so some info is missing or out of date for Void Destroyer 2.
The goal of this guide is to supplement and complement tutorials, with a quick and easy reference available within the game.

I grew up with games that required reading the manual (PC games), there were no tutorials and in the early days you had to have a joystick (which needed a dedicated card added to the PC), mouse support was a luxury that came later. Still the intent isn't that this manual is read from top to bottom, rather based on your interest and need when playing the game.
The guide is organized along game modes - ship and tactical.
The ship mode guide contains HUD element explanations.
Camera modes, targeting options and the use of command ship abilities.
The tactical mode guide contains interface element explanations.
Camera controls, issuing orders, building, and base management.
The guide also contains a quick overview of game modes.
Tips and tricks and story/mission hints.
Thank you for supporting Void Destroyer.
